description:
Listerine FreshBurst Antibacterial Mouthwash kills germs that cause bad breath & plaque.


Listerine FreshBurst Antibacterial Mouthwash kills germs that cause bad breath & plaque. Listerine FreshBurst gives you a deeper whole mouth clean than brushing alone. It:

- Kills germs that cause bad breath.
- Helps prevent and reduce plaque.
- Provides long lasting fresh breath
- Maintains healthy gums

Listerine FreshBurst Mouthwash is a suitable mouthwash for bad breath and reducing plaque. For a fresher and cleaner mouth than brushing alone.

Ever wondered why you need to incorporate an antibacterial mouthwash as part of your oral care routine? Brushing and flossing alone only reaches 25% of your mouth. Incorporating Listerine as your third step helps to kill germs in the remaining 75% of the mouth and can help reduce plaque to help provide that long-lasting fresh breath.

Listerine Antibacterial Mouthwash works to get rid of bad breath fast.



1L value pack

Antibacterial mouth wash

Kills germs causing bad breath & plaque
name: Listerine Freshburst Antibacterial Mouthwash 1L
